data.message: Jesus is coming back to judge the world esp the elite satanists who corrupt and manipulate the images of people and twist things to fit their own twisted agenda. oh and eternal life is a free gift the price is already paid Jesus died for you all you gotta do is trust in him. ask him to save you and he will. hes amazing. dont fall for this scandel. trust Jesus : ) <3

replies.message: we celebrate his birthday today but he is not coming back. he is dead now some 2000 years. he's dust somewhere in some desert. but that doesn't mean you have to stop being a good person.
sadly jess, there's no reward for being a good person but fuck it, do it anyway. its easier on yourself when you find yourself alone sometimes. you won't 'hate' being alone if you're a good person.

Ray Stash There isn't a reward for being a person because according to the Word there are no good people. Well nobody good enough to reach a perfect standard.  Jesus was the perfect person and paved the path to give you the reward as if you were the perfect person. It's a pretty good scenario if God really does love you and give you his righteousness. (He does : )) he transforms people, man. I wasn't even looking for him. :/ lean on God over people and you wont regret it. God is your best friend D':
Eminem x Yelawolf - Best Friend : "To the Father, Son and Holy Spirit, I hold you dearest. My best friend, best friend" :)

So tell me who wrote your Bible, Caraun, or Tanakh, or the many other Holy Books out there. Who wrote them because men lie, manipulate words & exaggerate truth to benefit themselves. So tell me how much truth is in those Holy Books that looks very much like Pimpin.

Multiple authors. We can compare manuscripts and use textual criticism. I say it is truth because I've experienced Jesus.  He affirmed that the old testament and law is good and of God and also that he was the word from the beginning:^)
At McDonald, Thank you and God bless you in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, Amen. I am really thrilled
